name: Roundabout Richochet
description:
Move along a path and shoot a projectile to collect all the coins! Ricochet the ball back into yourself to get another shot and collect more coins!

My entry for the GMTK2019 game jam!

A+D/⬅️➡️: Rotate along path

Space: Shoot

R/Esc: Restart Level

Source code available on my GitHub

If the game does not play at first (sometimes a problem in Chrome) just refresh the page!
